    WHERE(조건문)절과 ORDER BY(정렬)절

    January 31, 2022

    ☑️ 문법 SELECT * | {[DISTINCT] column | expression [alias], ...} FROM table [WHERE condition(s)] [ORDER BY {column, expr, alias} [ASC | DESC]];
